DOC.brief_title: A Study Safety Efficacy Pegylated Inferferon Alfa-2b ( PEG-Intron™ ) Versus Pegylated Interferon Alfa-2a ( PEGASYS™ ) Participants With Chronic Hepatitis B ( P08450 )
